name: Monkey's Agility
description: Innate: Udyr gains  5 bonus movement speed and  10% bonus attack speed for 5 seconds every time he uses an ability, stacking up to 3 times, up to a maximum of  15 bonus movement speed and  30% bonus attack speed. The duration refreshes on subsequent ability casts.
descriptions: Innate: Udyr gains  5 bonus movement speed and  10% bonus attack speed for 5 seconds every time he uses an ability, stacking up to 3 times, up to a maximum of  15 bonus movement speed and  30% bonus attack speed. The duration refreshes on subsequent ability casts.

Innate - Four Stances: Udyr has no ultimate ability and instead has 4 basic abilities. Each of his abilities provides a passive effect that lasts until he activates a different ability, called his current Stance. Activating any of his abilities will prevent his previous Stance from triggering any more on-hit effects, and will prevent him from activating another ability for 2 seconds.
Starting at level 16, all abilities can gain a 6th rank.

name: Tiger Stance
description: Stance: Udyr's basic attacks generate Tiger stacks on-hit, up to 3. At maximum stacks, Udyr's next basic attack is a Tiger Strike, which deals bonus physical damage over 2 seconds as well as instantly dealing any remaining damage from any previous Tiger Strikes on the target.
descriptions: Stance: Udyr's basic attacks generate Tiger stacks on-hit, up to 3. At maximum stacks, Udyr's next basic attack is a Tiger Strike, which deals bonus physical damage over 2 seconds as well as instantly dealing any remaining damage from any previous Tiger Strikes on the target.
Active: Udyr gains  bonus attack speed for 5 seconds, and instantly generates 3 Tiger stacks.

name: Turtle Stance
description: Stance: Udyr's basic attacks generate Turtle stacks on-hit, up to 3. At maximum stacks, Udyr's next basic attack  heals him for  2.5% − 5% (based on missing health) of his maximum health.
descriptions: Stance: Udyr's basic attacks generate Turtle stacks on-hit, up to 3. At maximum stacks, Udyr's next basic attack  heals him for  2.5% − 5% (based on missing health) of his maximum health.
Active: Udyr  shields himself for up to 5 seconds, and instantly generates 3 Turtle stacks.

name: Bear Stance
description: Stance: Udyr's basic attacks are  unstoppable and they  stun his target for 1 second. The stun cannot occur on the same target more than once every few seconds.
leveling:
Bonus Movement Speed:15 / 20 / 25 / 30 / 35 / 40%
Bonus Movement Speed Duration:2 / 2.25 / 2.5 / 2.75 / 3 / 3.25
levelings:
Bonus Movement Speed:15 / 20 / 25 / 30 / 35 / 40%
Bonus Movement Speed Duration:2 / 2.25 / 2.5 / 2.75 / 3 / 3.25
descriptions: Stance: Udyr's basic attacks are  unstoppable and they  stun his target for 1 second. The stun cannot occur on the same target more than once every few seconds.
Active: Udyr gains  bonus movement speed and is  ghosted for the next few seconds. Additionally, his next basic attack gains  50 bonus range and has him  lunge at his target.

name: Phoenix Stance
description: Stance: Udyr's basic attacks generate Phoenix stacks on-hit, up to 3. At maximum stacks, Udyr's next basic attack unleashes fire in a cone in front of him that deals magic damage to all enemies hit.
levelings: Total Magic Damage:»40 / 80 / 120 / 160 / 200 / 240 (+ 100% AP)«Magic Damage Per Second:10 / 20 / 30 / 40 / 50 / 60 (+ 25% AP)
descriptions: Stance: Udyr's basic attacks generate Phoenix stacks on-hit, up to 3. At maximum stacks, Udyr's next basic attack unleashes fire in a cone in front of him that deals magic damage to all enemies hit.

Active: Udyr unleashes an aura of pulsing waves of fire around himself for 4 seconds, dealing magic damage each second to all nearby enemies for the duration, as well as instantly generating 3 Phoenix stacks.
